You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image depicts an adult elephant and a calf standing on a grassy terrain. The adult elephant is large, with a long trunk and tusks, and its skin is textured and wrinkled. The calf is smaller, with smoother skin, and both are facing to the right. There is a clear sky in the background, and the lighting suggests it is daytime. There are no other significant objects or landmarks in the image.

The adult elephant has a long trunk and large ears, typical of its species, and the calf is significantly smaller, standing close to the adult for protection or guidance. The background is flat with a single tree in the distance, and the lighting suggests either dawn or dusk. There are no other subjects or notable landmarks in the image.
